text: Peperomia paradoxa is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== * Santiana, J. & Pitman, N. 2004. Peperomia paradoxa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. paradoxa Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1937
title: Peperomia paradoxa
